data.title: Weekly Shonen Jump and Weekly Shonen Magazine's first combined book 'Shonen Jan Maga' is born, a super rare special commemorative issue is 2264 pages of the masterpiece
data.meta_description: The news blog specialized in Japanese culture, odd news, gadgets and all other funny stuffs. Updated everyday.
data.text:
© Shonen Jan Maga Gakuen Production Committee

Shueisha and Kodansha announced that they have produced a special commemorative issue of Shonen Jan Maga combining '

Weekly Shonen Jump ' and ' Weekly Shonen Magazine '. The Special Commemorative Issue contains the first episode of a total of 44 works serialized in Weekly Shonen Jump and Weekly Shonen Magazine, with 2264 pages and 13 cm thick.

Janmaga Gakuen 【official】 (@jm_gakuen) | Twitter

https://twitter.com/jm_gakuen

© Shonen Jan Maga Gakuen Production Committee

The format of Shonen Jean Maga is the same B5 format as regular Weekly Shonen Jump and Weekly Shonen Magazine, but because of the impossi- ble number of pages of 2264 pages, it has a unique presence when arranged side by side.

© Shonen Jan Maga Gakuen Production Committee

The weight is about 3.35 kg, and it is the weight that can be muscle training simply by holding the hand and reading a manga. The main characters of popular titles of Weekly Shonen Jump and Weekly Shonen Magazine are on the cover.

© Shonen Jan Maga Gakuen Production Committee

The first manga you can read after opening the cover is the first episode of '

ONE PIECE '.

© Shonen Jan Maga Gakuen Production Committee

The Shonen Jan Maga Special Commemorative Issue was part of the planning of the free Shonen Jan Maga Gakuen website for a limited time, which was opened on April 8, 2019 as the first ever joint project with Weekly Shonen Jump and Weekly Shonen Magazine. It was produced by In 'Shonen Jang Maga Gakuen', you can read about 150 titles serialized in a total of 5 media, 'Weekly Shonen Jump', 'Shonor Jump +', 'Weekly Shonen Magazine', 'Separate Shonen Magazine', and 'Magazine Pocket', for free. You

Shonen Jan Maga Gakuen was born with the idea that “you want to increase the chance for young people to get in touch with the appeal of manga”, so it is necessary to input “born year” at the first access, and only users 22 years of age or younger can read it. It has become. Publication period is until Monday, June 10, 2019.

This Shonen Janmaga Special Commemorative Issue is available as a prize for the following three projects.

1: In the content 'Reading impression statement contest' in Shonen Jean Maga Gakuen, it is presented to one 'Best Award'

2: Present to one person by lottery from 'intermediate test' participant held in Shonen Jan Maga Gakuen

3: Presented to one person by lottery from 'final exam' held in Shonen Jan Maga Gakuen

© Shonen Jan Maga Gakuen Production Committee

In the 'intermediate and final exams', 12 questions were randomly taken from 71 works of 'Digital Shonen Jan Maga' published in Shonen Jan Maga Gakuen, and people who posted test results on Twitter with a designated hash tag We will draw lots from inside. Result announcement is scheduled for June 11, 2019 (Tuesday), when the release of Shonen Jan Maga Gakuen will end.
